description-detail: Our 2 bungalows have a bedroom (with Queen bed), living room (with sofa-bed and TV), a kitchenette (equipped with dishes, refridgerator, oven), bathrooom. Each bungalow has a palapa, which includes a sofa and two bunk-beds with individual mattresses.
description-detail-2: We have a common area with a grill available for our guests. Our pool is large and deep, surrounded by tables and chairs with shades to relax and sunbathe.
kitchenette: Kitchenette (equipped with refrigerator, blender, microwave, dishes)
palapa: Palapa (with two individual-sized bunk beds and a sofa)
pool-detail: We have a large and deep pool
tv-detail: All units have SKY TV access
grill-detail: Grill available to enjoy with family or friends.
